description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController for a Spring Boot application. It provides basic endpoints for health check, serving API documentation, and a welcome message.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that handles basic endpoints such as welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info for the backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when accessed at root.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI for API documentation, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns application health status indicating it is OK.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
